wavemedia.graphic

Class GraphicHandlerObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • wavemedia.graphic.GraphicHandlerObject

  • public class GraphicHandlerObject
extends java.lang.Object
    Graphic object class for passing to the graphics handler to draw graphics to screen.
    Version:
    1.0 11/03/2015
    Author:
    tjd511
